body:
Today's D.S question starter is: What is your favorite food/cuisine? I wrote this because bpirr wrote about KFC and Popeye's, which made me hungry! Enjoy this gastronomical edition of the daily D.S!

-peace out

C_P

P.S: If you guys have any ideas about D.S ideas, u can post in the comments ^-^

title: D.S #3: FOOOOOD!

replies.body:
heheheh 
Filipino food~everything especially lumpia
Chinese food~also everything
(note to canuck- since we're both in s.f i recommend going to San Tung because it has the glazed chicken ever and also Riverside because it has the best everything. :3)
